name: Peter's Special Afternoon
description:
Peter's Special Afternoon is a tower-defense cross fishing game for the GitHub GameOff 2018 GameJam. This game is our first game and we appreciate any feedback.

Features

  • A short story
  • 3 Levels
  • 4 Towers
  • 2 Enemies
  • 2 Fishes
  • and Peter

Install

Windows: unzip the .zip and execute the .exe

Linux: unzip the .zip and make the .x86_64 file or .x86 executable and run it

Controls

Press Esc or P to open the pausemenu

Fisher:

  • W and S or arrowkey Up and Down to move Peter
  • F or E to fish and to catch when there is a !

Tower:

  • Click on a tower on the left to select it
  • Click on a free node to place the tower

The source code for the game is available: https://github.com/ZankHunt/PetersSpecialAfternoon

You can use the stuff however you want.
